title: WTB: Pelty Horizontal, PSA 5, 6, 7 or equiv
author: Ericc22

posts.post_title: WTB: Pelty Horizontal, PSA 5, 6, 7 or equiv
posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I am interested in picking up a Pelty Horizontal. I am fine wit raw or graded, but want something in a higher grade, around psa 5, 6 or possibly 7.

In regards to price, I stick to vintagecardprices so know I am good in that range, depending on quality of the card.

Please send me a pm if you are interested. And thanks for listening!

Eric

Hi Eric,

Perhaps you have seen it, but there is a psa 5 on ebay for $300.  Not sure how that price compares with your guide.

Best, David

Thanks David. I have a search setup for it, but for some reason I had not seen that one. 

Much appreciated, and if you have a Pelty horizontal for sale let me know!

Eric

Just giving this a quick bump - if you have a high quality Pelty horizontal for sale, let me know. Thanks!

Eric
